channel.title: Are there good "Payout" Gateways? How to send money to users
channel.description:
Hey all, I'm wondering what people use to send money to users. Is there anything out there that can handle receiving money a la Stripe / Braintree, but also make payments out to other people? Some example use cases:
* An affiliate program that makes monthly payouts to affiliates. * A marketplace that handles both buyers and sellers.

item.title: Are there good "Payout" Gateways? How to send money to users
item.dc:creator: Tom_Hammond
item.description:
If it’s us only, dwolla has a great system.

Paypal also let’s you send payments, and you can do it en masse.

item.description:
You can do that with Stripe Connect, even down to taking a % from payments before transferring to the seller’s account. I believe you can either manage seller accounts yourself (getting all the needed info manually), or connect pre-existing Stripe accounts to your application.
